name: Gravity Switcher
description:
Gravity Switcher was made for GeoJam 2021 in a week with the theme "Switch."

Gravity Switcher is a game where you play as an adventurous circle wanting to obtain the great treasure that is the Flat Icosahedron. Lucky for you, you have the ability to switch gravity at will. You can switch gravity by pressing the "Space" key. Gravity will cycle through down, right, up, and left (in that order). Do whatever it takes to obtain the legendary Flat Icosahedron and become the Ultimate Gravity Switcher!

Once you have become the Ultimate Gravity Switcher, try your hand at also becoming the Fastest Gravity Switcher with the built in speedrun timer. To the start the timer, press "Start" from the Main Menu. Make sure to share your best times in the comments below!

Controls:

Space - Switch gravity

P - Open pause menu
